hero.headline: Build the future of fair exchange
hero.subheadline: OpenEconomy is 100% open source and community-driven. Every contribution makes a difference.

header.headline: Ways to Contribute
header.subheadline: You don't need to code to make a difference. Here's how you can help.

items.title: Code
items.subtitle: Build features, fix bugs, improve performance
items.description: Our stack: Nuxt 3, TypeScript, Tailwind, Firebase, Solidity. Check out the 'good first issue' labels on GitHub.

items.title: Design
items.subtitle: Create interfaces, graphics, and experiences
items.description: Help make OpenEconomy beautiful and accessible. We use Figma and always need UX input.

items.title: Content
items.subtitle: Write docs, guides, and marketing content
items.description: Clear documentation helps everyone. Blog posts spread the word. Translations reach new communities.

items.title: Community
items.subtitle: Moderate, organize, and grow the community
items.description: Help new participants get started. Moderate Discord. Organize local events.

items.title: Testing
items.subtitle: Find bugs and suggest improvements
items.description: Use the platform, report bugs, suggest improvements. Fresh eyes find fresh problems.

items.title: Financial
items.subtitle: Keep the lights on
items.description: OpenEconomy is non-profit. Donations cover servers, domains, and development tools.

items.title: Frontend
items.description: Nuxt 3, Vue 3, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, PWA

items.title: Blockchain
items.description: Polygon (+ Base planned), Solidity smart contracts

items.title: Public Attribution
items.description: Listed on our contributors page with link to your profile

items.title: OpenEconomy Credits
items.description: Receive platform credits for your contributions

items.title: NFT Badges
items.description: Special contributor badges displayed on your profile

items.title: Governance Rights
items.description: Active contributors get voting rights on platform decisions

cta.headline: Ready to contribute?
cta.subheadline: Join our Discord to find where your skills fit best.
